snippet: The Chapter 11 filing by the Journal Register Company, which is part of Digital First Media, comes three years after the publisher emerged from a prior bankruptcy case.
abstract: The Chapter 11 filing by the Journal Register Company, which is part of Digital First Media, comes three years after the publisher emerged from a prior bankruptcy case.

headline.main: Newspaper Publisher Journal Register Files for Bankruptcy and Plans for a Sale
headline.print_headline: Journal Register Files for Bankruptcy for a Second Time
